# Toko Obat Ro Tua - Laravel Pharmacy Application

## Project Overview
A complete pharmacy management application with role-based access control.

## Step 1 Progress Tracking ✅ COMPLETED
- [x] Create project instructions file
- [x] Setup Laravel project structure
- [x] Configure authentication
- [x] Install and configure Spatie permissions
- [x] Create roles and middleware
- [x] Create Bootstrap 5 admin layout
- [x] Create database seeders
- [x] Create README documentation

## Project Details
- **Framework**: Laravel 10.x
- **Database**: MySQL (XAMPP/Laragon)
- **Auth**: Laravel Auth with Blade
- **Roles**: owner, kasir, admin_gudang (Spatie Permission)
- **UI**: Bootstrap 5 admin layout

## Deliverables Step 1 ✅
- ✅ Project bisa login
- ✅ Redirect dashboard sesuai role
- ✅ UI admin konsisten dan responsive
- ✅ Role-based access control
- ✅ Database seeder untuk data awal

## Default Users
- **Owner:** owner@rotua.test / password
- **Kasir:** kasir@rotua.test / password
- **Admin Gudang:** gudang@rotua.test / password
